description:
The third grand tour of the year is almost upon us, and whilst we certainly haven‚Äôt been deprived of racing since the end of the Tour de France, it feels like an age since the last three-week race! Dan and Ollie preview this year‚Äôs Vuelta a Espa√±a, looking at the route in detail, the favourites, and we make our predictions for the win!

Watch the Vuelta a Espa√±a on GCN+ üëâ https://gcn.eu/vuelta

01:12 Vuelta 2021 Recap
01:52 Route
12:22 GC Favourites

22:59 Predictions

description:
Why is having a head tube extender on your bike so bad? Does carbon fiber make bikes creak? What do I need to know about latex inner tubes before making the switch? We answer all these questions and more on this week's tech clinic!

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro 
0:16 - Do cheap carbon frames squeak?
2:57 - What do riders at the Tour de France drink?
4:59 - What is the difference between wide and narrow handlebars?
6:33 - How do I know when to change tyres?
7:26 - Do cyclists warm up their tyres like F1 drivers?
8:52 - What do I need to know about latex inner tubes?
9:33 - What product does Ollie use on his hair?!
10:08 - When should you stop pedalling down descents?
11:32 - Why is having a chimney on a bike so bad?
13:15 - Can I leave the clutch on my gravel bike the whole time?

Brought to you by the world‚Äôs biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we‚Äôre obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We‚Äôve also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding.

description:
All cyclists want to improve their average speed just a bit. Not only is it a pretty good indicator of your ability, but it also means you can spend more time in bed before your commute, or maybe beat your friends to the cafe! Hank's got some top tips on how to improve your all important average speed!

0:00 - Intro
0:27 - Variables
1:01 - Fitness
1:53 - One Thing At A Time
2:30 - Choose Your Terrain

4:35 - Pacing
6:09 - Plan Your Efforts
6:54 - Fuelling
8:22 - Choose Your Route
9:04 - Get Aero
10:20 - Choose Your Kit
11:20 - Maintenance

description:
Cycle lanes are a great way to get more people on bikes but there is often a lot of opposition to new cycling infrastructure proposals from motorists. But do bike lanes in fact _reduce_ traffic? Hank & Dan discuss. We also bring you updates about SBT GRVL, Mark Beaumont‚Äôs latest challenge, a return to racing action for Egan Bernal, and all your favourite weekly segments!

Sign up for this year‚Äôs Zwift Academy üëâ https://gcn.eu/ZwiftAcademy2022

00:45 This Week in Cycling
02:36 Do Cycle Lanes Reduce Traffic?
06:26 Vuelta a Espa√±a
06:56 Cycling Shorts
14:07 Hack/Bodge
17:56 Caption Competition
19:55 Comments of the Week
23:10 Coming up on GCN

description:
It‚Äôs always a little quieter in the weeks between the biggest races in the world, the Tour de France and the Vuelta Espa√±a, but there are some key races going on! We saw more domination from the GOAT Marianne Vos in the Tour of Scandinavia, the European Road Championships, and the biggest news of all, Egan Bernal will be racing again after his horror crash just 7 months ago! Dan talks you through all this, plus more.

In association with The PTO üëâ https://gcn.eu/PTO

Ride with Tom Pidcock today at 6pm BST on Zwift üëâ https://www.zwift.com/uk/events/view/3090745

description:
If you run tubeless tyres, you have to replace your sealant from time to time as it dries up and stops working. But how often do you need to do this? Ollie explains how to check and replace your tubeless sealant in this week‚Äôs Maintenance Monday video!

0:37 How Long Does Sealant Last?
1:21 How To Check Your Sealant

description:
The 2022 Arctic Race of Norway concludes with a 159.1km hilly route around Trondheim. There are two short categorised climbs on the route before 5 laps of the local Trondheim circuit featuring the Tyholt Tower climb (1.4km at 7.7%).

title: Incredible Solo Ride! | Arctic Race Of Norway 2022 Stage 4 Highlights

description:
Marianne Vos takes her fourth stage win of the #TOSC22 with Cecilie  Uttrup Ludwig finishing in the bunch to win the overall GC!

title: No One Can Stop Her! #shorts

description:
The final stage of the Tour of Scandinavia is the longest of the race, clocking in at 154.3 km. With only a pair of 3rd category climbs on the menu however, it may be difficult to bring about any major changes on GC as we head towards another likely sprint.

description:
It‚Äôs the video you‚Äôve been waiting for‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre back at the brutal Salita Scanuppia in Italy, the legendary climb that could be the steepest road in the world! After Ollie tried and failed to ride up its mythical 40% slopes, we‚Äôre back with Strava‚Äôs #1 ranked climber, Andrew Feather, a.k.a. ‚ÄúThe Twig‚Äù. Will he be able to do what Ollie couldn‚Äôt and conquer the world‚Äôs hardest cycling climb?

In association with @Campagnolo Official üëâ https://gcn.eu/Campagnolo
In association with @Pinarello Official üëâ https://gcn.eu/Pinarello

description:
Andrew Feather eats KOMs for breakfast. As the number one ranked climber on Strava, GCN‚Äôs own ‚ÄúTwig‚Äù needs a bike to match his insane w/kg numbers! Cue, his insanely light Canyon Ultimate CFR, which takes weight-saving to the extreme!

Simply put, we‚Äôre obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

title: Race Blown Apart On Tough Summit Finish | Tour Of Scandinavia 2022 Stage 5 Highlights

description:
Over the past few months, Manon has been training for her longest ever ride at SBT GRVL using Wahoo Systm. To see how ready she is for this epic race, she visited the new Wahoo Sports Science Center in Colorado for a tour and to undergo an in-depth fitness test. How much fitter is Manon now and is she ready for her brutal 142-mile gravel challenge?

In association with @Wahoo Fitness üëâhttp://gcn.eu/Wahoo-Fitness

01:33 Wahoo Tour
06:18 Fitness Test
10:56 Amani Team
11:51 Results
19:23 Outro
